00081   BmlCaen767ReadoutConfigurationBlock &setBools(bool enable, bool softtrigger, bool bltro, bool arrayro) {
00082      int boolword(0);
00083 
00084      boolword =  ((((boolword | ((static_cast<int>(enable) & 0x1) << CROENABLEBIT)) | 
00085                                 ((static_cast<int>(softtrigger) & 0x1) << CROSOFTTRGBIT)) | 
00086                                 ((static_cast<int>(bltro) & 0x1) << CROBLTROBIT)) |
00087                                 ((static_cast<int>(arrayro) & 0x1) << CROARROBIT));
00088        obj()->setIntVal(kBmlCaen767RoConfBoolCol, boolword);
00089        return *this;
00090   }
00091 
00092   bool isEnabled() {
00093     return (static_cast<bool> (   (getIntVal(kBmlCaen767RoConfBoolCol) >> CROENABLEBIT) & 0x1 ));
00094   }
00095 
00096   bool isSoftTrigger() {
00097     return (static_cast<bool> (   (getIntVal(kBmlCaen767RoConfBoolCol) >> CROSOFTTRGBIT) & 0x1 ));
00098   }
00099 
00100   bool isBltReadout() {
00101     return (static_cast<bool> (   (getIntVal(kBmlCaen767RoConfBoolCol) >> CROBLTROBIT) & 0x1 ));
00102   }
00103 
00104   bool isArrayReadout() {
00105     return (static_cast<bool> (   (getIntVal(kBmlCaen767RoConfBoolCol) >> CROARROBIT) & 0x1 ));
00106   }

00126   void print(  std::ostream& os) {
00127     os << "BmlCaenReadoutConfigurationData: " << std::hex << std::endl;
00128     os << "Crate Number Address: " << getCrateNumber() << std::dec << std::endl;
00129     os << "Readout Period: " << getReadPeriod() << std::dec << std::endl;
00130     os << "Enabled? " << isEnabled() << std::endl;
00131     os << "Softtrigger? " <<  isSoftTrigger() << std::endl;
00132     os << "Blt Readout? " <<  isBltReadout() << std::endl;
00133     os << "Array Readout? " <<  isArrayReadout() << std::endl;
00134     os << "Mode word (contains info above): " << std::hex << getMode() << std::dec << std::endl;
00135
